body: Funny that NTR gets a bad rep for being NTR but when half the doujins are trash plots like this you cant help but feel bad.
His uncle is horrible but you’re stupid and horrible…lol
I know I have to turn off my brain to read NTR. I try. But... this plot.... lol
Wow like wtf old guy tries to rape her and she scratches him to defend herself then somehow it becomes blackmail material ofc....
Now they have made it official that they don't give a fuck about making sense in the story. Got mental trauma from a measly scratch 🤣
Uhh what's with the ntr today
these stories just get worse and worse, how are you going to believe that you could get expelled for slapping someone for trying to sexually assault you.
